rComments: Patrick is super nice and helpful. Stats & research courses are never ideal; nevertheless, he really makes what could be a dry 3 hour lecture, bearable. No final exam, but very long final project (around 40+ pages). However, he allows the topic to be entirely up to your interest and I left the class actually learning how to produce research! :)

Very unprofessional, and an extremely hard marker. You could know all the content but if he doesn't like your analysis or the way you explained it he will give you poor grades. Does not have a clear grading system. The class average in my class was a low 60% more fails in this class than any other. Does not seem to care for his students success.
Worst theory class ever... wouldn't recommend this professor, very cocky. the material is already boring and he makes it even more boring..

Pour un nouveau professeur, il était très bien. Ses explications sont claires et il donne plusieurs exemples. Ses notes PowerPoints sont plutôt minimes, alors être en cours et prendre des notes est nécessaire pour avoir une bonne note. En revanche, les examens étaient plus difficiles qu'attendu. Il faut vraiment étudier pour avoir un A.
C'était sa première session à l'université et c'était à peine perceptible!!! Il nous aide et les demandes sont claires !!!

Great prof! Still a PhD candidate and way better than most profs i've had. His powerpoints are not very detailed so you need to take lots of notes but the readings are clear and help add to the class content. Theories are very clear, as is what is on the exam, though he is a bit of a tough grader. If you go to class he give extra info!!
